column3: Le fameux dessert qui ravit tous les coeurs

column5: préchauffer le four à 220°,étaler la pâte et la disposer dans le plat,la piquer avec une cuillère,couper les pommes en 8,mettre un fond de farine sur la pâte,dispoer les pommes,saupoudrer avec le sucre, la farine restante et un peu de cannelle,mettre des morceaux de beurre sur tout le gâteau,mettre au four 35 minutes

column5: Mélanger tous les ingrédients dans un saladieravec un fouet électrique,Faire fondre une noisette de beurre dans une poêle,Cuire crêpe après crêpe

column5: Mettre le thé dans un infuser et le placer dans une carafe d'eau,Ajouter les feuilles de menthe,Laisser infuser 1h30,ajouter le sucre et mélanger,Servir froid

column4: shortening:2-Jan cup,sugar:1 1/2 cups,:2 eggs,:pinch salt,sour milk:2-Jan cup,soda water:1 tsp,flour:1 3/4 cups,baking powder:1 1/2 tsp,chopped nuts:2-Jan cup
column5: Bake in three layer pans at 350 degrees.

column4: margarine:2-Jan cup,sugar:2 cups,eggs:2 ,cocoa:5 tbsp,salt:2-Jan tsp,sour milk:2-Jan cup,baking soda:2 tsp,flour:2 cups,cloves:2-Jan tsp
column5: Mix all ingredients together.  Pour in 1 cup boiling water.  Mix well.  Bake about 35 minutes at 375 degrees.

column4: flour:3 cups,sugar:1 1/2 cups,cocoa:3-Jan cup,baking powder:2 1/4 tsp,baking soda:1 1/2 tsp,Best Foods Mayonnaise:1 1/2 cups,water:1 1/2 cups,vanilla:1 1/2 tsp
column5: Makes  2 layer cake.

column4: lemon cake mix:1 box,water:4-Mar cup,lemon jello:1 small pkg,vegetable oil:4-Mar cup,eggs:4 ,powdered sugar:2 cups,lemon juice:2-Jan cups
column5: Mix first 5 ingredients well, about 4 minutes.  Bake at 350 degrees in a 9x13 pan for 35 minutes. Poke holes in warm cake and pour on mixture of powdered sugar and lemon juice.

column4: diced apples:4 cups,sugar:2 cups,chopped nuts:1 cups,eggs, well beaten:2 ,vanilla:2 tsp,flour:2 cups,baking powder:2 tsp,cinnamon:2 tsp,vegetable oil:2-Jan cups,salt:1 tsp
column5: Mix apples and sugar well.  Add oil, nuts, and eggs.  Add vanilla and dry ingredients.  Bake at 350 degrees for 40-45 minutes.  Serve with whipped cream or top with cream cheese frosting.

column4: butter:2 tbps,flour:1 1/2 cups,pears:3 ,eggs:2 ,sugar:1 cup,milk:2-Jan cup,saltpowdered sugar:8-Jan tsp
column5: Butter and flour a 9 inch round pan.  Peel and slice pears.  Blend eggs, sugar, milk, and salt.  Add flour, mix well.  Fold 1/2 of pears into batter.  Pour into pan, fan remaining pears on top.  Dot with butter.  Bake at 350 degrees about 55 minutes.  Sprinkle with powdered sugar.

column4: butter:2-Jan cup,sugar:1 cup,sour milk:1 cup,graham crackers, crushed:32 ,baking soda:1 tsp,chopped nuts:1 cup
column5: Cream butter and sugar.  Add crushed crackers, sour milk, and soda.  Stir in nuts.  Bake in 10 inch square baking pan.  Bake in 350 degree oven for 30-35 minutes.  Serve with whipped cream or thin powdered sugar icing.

column4: margarine:2-Jan cup,sugar:2 cups,eggs:2 ,cocoa:5 tbsp,salt:2-Jan tsp,sour milk:2-Jan cup,baking soda:2 tsp,flour:2 cup,cloves:2-Jan tsp
column5: Mix all ingredients together.  Pour in 1 cup boiling water. Mix well.  Bake about 35 minutes at 375 degrees."

column4: wheat germ optional:4-Jan cup,graham cracker crumbs:1 3/4 cup,sugar:3 tbsp,cinnamon:1 tsp,melted butter:3-Jan cup,sour cream:2-Jan pint,sugar:3-Jan cup,vanilla:1 tsp,salt:8-Jan tsp,cottage cheese:2-Jan pint,eggs:4 ,lemon juice:1 tbsp,vanilla:2 tsp,sugar:3-Feb cup,flour:2 tbsp,flour:2 tbsp,salt:41000 tsp
column5: Combine first 5 ingredients to make crust.  Save 1/4 cup for top.  Press remaining crumbs evenly over bottom and about 2 inches up sides of a 9 inch spring form pan.  Prepare filling:  beat cream cheese and cottage cheese until smooth.  Add eggs, one at a time, bating well. Blend in lemon juice and vanilla.  Mix sugar, flour and salt.  Add to cheese mixture.  Pour into crust.  Bake at 350 degrees until set, about 35 to 40 minutes.  Combine topping ingredients (sour cream, sugar, vanilla, and salt).  Spread evenly over hot cheese cake.  Return to oven until cream sets, about 5 minutes.  Cool in pan on rack.  Sprinkle reserved crumbs around edge of cake.

column4: lemon cake mix:1 pkg,eggs:4 ,lemon instant pudding:1 small pkg,water:1 cup,oil:2-Jan cup,poppy seeds:4-Jan cup
column5: Mix all for 4 minutes.  Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes."

column4: sifted flour:4 cups,baking powder:2-Jan tsp,salt:1 1/2 tsp,cinnamon:1 1/2 tsp,nutmeg:1 tsp,whole pecans:24 ounces,canned pineapple, chopped:1 3/4 cups,whole canned cherries:1 3/4 cups,golden raisins:3 1/4 cups,sugar:2 1/4 cups,eggs:6 ,brandy flavoring:3 tbsp
column5: Sift dry ingredients into a 4 quart bowl.  Add fruit and nuts.  Mix until well coated.  Set aside.  Cream butter, gradually add sugar and cream until fluffy.  Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each.  Add brandy.  Combine with fruit mixture.  Mix well.  Turn into a 10 inch tube pan or four 1# coffee cans lined with foil, filling pans 2/3 full. Bake in slow oven, 275 degrees for 2 3/4 to 3 hours.  About 1/2 hour before done brush lightly with honey or light corn syrup.  Cool completely then wrap tightly in foil to store for several weeks.  Brush with brandy about once a week.

column4: sugar:2-Jan cup,butter:2-Jan cup,egg:1 ,molasses:1 cup,sifted flour:2 1/2 cups,soda:1 1/2 tsp,cinnamon:1 tsp,ginger:1 tsp,cloves:2-Jan tsp,hot water:1 cup
column5: Bake in greased pan for 35 minutes at 325-350 degrees.

column4: oatmeal:1 cup,boiling water:1 1/4 cups,brown sugar:1 cup,white sugar:1 cup,margarine:2-Jan cup,eggs:2 ,flour:1 1/3 cups,salt:2-Jan tsp,soda:1 tsp,cinnamon:1 tsp,chopped nuts:1 cup,evaporated milk:2-Jan cup,butter:6 tbsp,coconut:1 cup,valencia peanuts:1 tsp
column5: Pour the water over the oatmeal.  Let stand for 20 minutes.  Add remaining cake ingredients.  Mix well and pour into a greased 9"x12" pan.  Let stand while mixing topping.  To prepare topping:  Mix all ingredients together over low heat, until butter melts.  Spoon over unbaked cake.  Bake 45 minutes at 350 degrees.

column4: angel food cake mix:1 15-16 ounce pkg,frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed:4-Mar cup,frozen light whipped topping, thawed:1 container,plain low fat yogurt:2-Jan cup
column5: Prepare angel food cake as directed on package, but pour 1/3 cup of the thawed orange juice into a 2 cup measure and add enough water for the mixture to equal the amount of water called for in package directions.  Continue to prepare cake as directed, baking the batter in an ungreased 10 inch tube pan.  Immediately invert the cake, leaving in pan.  Cool completely.  Loosen sides of cake from pan, remove cake.  To make the topping, in a medium bowl, gently stir together the thawed topping and yogurt.  Fold in remaining orange juice concentrate.  Spread topping mixture over top ad sides of cake.

column4: unsalted butter, softened:1 cup,sugar:1 cup,vanilla:2 tsp,grated orange peel:2 tsp,unsifted cake flour:2 1/4 cups,fresh orange juice:2-Jan cup,eggs:4 large,baking powder:4-Mar tsp,baking soda:4-Jan tsp,poppy seeds:2 tbsp,powdered sugar:2-Jan cup,fresh orange juice:2 1/2 tsp
column5: Preheat oven to 325 degrees.  Grease and flour a 9x5x3 inch loaf pan, tap out excess flour.  In large bowl beat together softened butter, sugar, vanilla, and orange peel until pale and fluffy.  Beat in flour, then remaining ingredients, except the glaze (powdered sugar and 2 1/2 tsp. orange juice).  Mix until well blended.  Spread in prepared pan.  With handle of a wooden spoon, make 1/2 inch deep score down center length of batter.  Bake 50-60 minutes, until wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean.  Cool in pan on rack 30 minutes, invert onto rack, remove pan.  Cool completely.  To prepare glaze seal powdered sugar and orange juice in small zipper-style bag.  Gently massage mixture with fingers until blended and smooth.  Snip off corner of bag.  Drizzle glaze over cake.  Let stand 1 hour or until glaze is set.

column4: crushed pineapple:1  2 pound can,yellow cake mix:1 pkg,butter:1 cube,sliced almonds:1 pkg
column5: Spread pineapple in baking dish.  Sprinkle cake mix on this.  Dice butter on top. Sprinkle with almonds.  Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes."

column4: oil:1 cup,sugar:2 cups,eggs:4 ,flour:2 cups,soda:1 tsp,salt:2-Jan tsp,cinnamon:1 tsp,vanilla:1 tsp,crushed pineapple, drained:1 cup,chopped walnuts:1 cup,cream cheese:3 ounces,margarine:4-Jan pound,powdered sugar:2 cups,vanilla:1 tsp,water:2 Tbsp
column5: Mix all cake ingredients.  Bake in greased and floured 9"x13" pan at 350 degrees for 35 minutes.  Frost when cool.

column4: sugar:2 cups,shortening:1 cup,milk:2-Jan cup,mashed potatoes:1 cup,eggs, beaten separately:4 ,flour:2 cups,baking powder:2 tsp,cocoa:2 tsp,chopped walnuts:1 cup
column5: Mix in order given.   Bake at 350 degrees for 25 minutes in two, 9" pans.

column4: cornflakes:4 cups,butter:3-Jan cup,sugar:4-Jan cup,gelatin:1 1/2 tbsp,cold water:2-Jan cup,eggs, separated:2 ,salt:2-Jan tsp,milk:2-Jan cup,cottage cheese:1 pound,lemon juice:4-Jan cup,heavy cream:2-Jan cup
column5: Crush flakes, mix with butter and sugar.  Press 3/4 of mixture into spring for pan.  Chill.  Soften gelatin in water.  Beat egg yolks slightly, stir in salt, sugar and milk.  Cook over hot water or very low heat.  Stir constantly until it thickens.  Remove from heat.  Stir in softened gelatin.  Cool.  Beat cheese until creamy.  Combine with lemon rind and juice.  Add to gelatin mixture, mixing well.  Whip cream until stiff.  Beat egg whites until stiff but not dry.  Fold cheese mixture to whipped cream.  Spread in pan over crumb mixture.  Sprinkle remaining crumbs on top.  Chill until firm.

column4: yellow cake mix:1 pkg,instant vanilla pudding:1 pkg,eggs:4 ,oil:4-Mar cup,sherry cooking wine:4-Mar cup,nutmeg:1 tsp
column5: Beat for 5 minutes.  Bake for 45 minutes at 350 degrees in angel food pan that has been greased and floured.  Turn to 300 degrees after 20 minutes."

column4: chopped pitted prunes:1 cup,walnuts:1 cup,flour:2 cups,baking soda:1 tsp,cinnamon:1 1/2 tsps,nutmeg:1 1/2 tsps,allspice:1 tsp,salt:4-Jan tsp,flour:2 cups,buttermilk:1 cup,eggs:3 ,sugar:2-Jan cup,buttermilk:2-Jan cup,soda:2-Jan tsp,unsalted butter:4-Jan cup
column5: Bake in greased and floured 9" bundt pan at 350 degrees for 45-50 minutes.  Cool 15 minutes.  Loosen around edges with thin spatula.  Pierce with a wooden pick.  Glaze directions:  Cook glaze ingredients over medium heat until full boil and butter melts.  Ladle glaze over cake.

column4: berries:3 cups,flour:3 cups,sugar:2 cups,salt:1 tsp,cinnamon:3 tsps,nutmeg:1 tsp,soda water:1 tsp,oil:1 1/4 cups,eggs:4
column5: Bake in two 9" loaf pans, greased and floured, at 350 degrees for one hour.

column4: flour:4 1/2 cups,sugar:2 1/4 cups,cocoa:2-Jan cups,baking powder:3 1/2 tsps,baking soda:2 1/4 tsps,Best Foods Mayonnaise:2 1/4 cups,water:2 1/4 cups,vanilla:2 1/4 tsps
column5: Grease three 9" layer pans, one with waxed paper.  Sift dry ingredients into large bowl.  Stir in mayonnaise.  Stir in water and vanilla until smooth.  Pour into pans.  Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes.  Cool.  Frost with chocolate frosting.

column4: flour:3 cups,sugar:1 1/2 cups,cocoa:3-Jan cup,baking powder:2 1/4 tsps,baking soda:1 1/2 tsps,Best Foods Mayonnaise:1 1/2 cups,water:1 1/2 cups,vanilla:1 1/2 tsps
column5: Grease two 9" layer pans, line with waxed paper.  Sift dry ingredients into large bowl.  Stir in mayonnaise.  Stir in water and vanilla until smooth.  Pour into pans.  Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes.  Cool.  Frost with chocolate frosting.

column4: butter:3-Jan cup,brown sugar:2-Jan cup,eggs:2 ,sugar:3-Feb cup,fruit juice:6 tbsp,vanilla:1 tsp,sifted flour:1 cup,baking powder:3-Jan tsp,salt:4-Jan tsp
column5: Melt butter in oven-proof skillet.  Add brown sugar.  Arrange fruit in pan.  To make cake batter, beat eggs about 5 minutes until thick and lemon colored.  Gradually add sugar.  Then add all at once fruit juice an vanilla.  Sift together and beat in flour, baking powder, and salt.  Pour batter over fruit an bake until done, about 45 minutes at 350 degrees.

column4: cold butter:2-Jan cup,sugar:2-Jan cup,brown sugar:2-Jan cup,vanilla:1 tsp,egg:1 ,flour:1 1/2 cups,baking soda:2-Jan tsp,salt:2-Jan tsp,chocolate chips:1 package
column5: Mix at low speed.  Add chocolate chips and nuts by hand.  Press into balls in cookie scoop.  Bake at 300 degrees for 15 minutes on middle rack.

column4: semisweet chocolate chips:1 cup,light corn syrup:3 tbsp,bourbon (or light cream):2-Jan cup,crushed vanilla wafers:2 1/2 cups,powdered sugar:2-Jan cup,finely chopped walnuts:1 cup
column5: Melt chocolate in double boiler over hot water.  Combine syrup and liquid.  Combine crumbs, sugar, and nuts.  Add chocolate mixture.  Let stand 30 minutes.  Shape in 1" balls.  Roll in granulated or powdered sugar.  Let ripen i covered container at lest 3 days.

column4: flour:2 cups,baking soda:2-Jan tsp,salt:2-Jan tsp,margarine:1 cup,sugar:1 1/2 cups,eggs:2 ,vanilla:1 tsp,All-Bran cereal:1 cup,chocolate chips:1 cup
column5: Sift flour, soda, and salt.  Blend butter and sugar.  Add eggs and vanilla, beat well.  Add All-Bran cereal and chocolate chips.  Add dry ingredients, mix well.  Drop by spoonful onto cookie sheet.  Bake at 375 degrees about 12 minutes.

column4: flour:3 cups,brown sugar:1 1/4 cups,margarine:2-Jan cup,crunchy peanut butter:3-Jan cup,salt:4-Jan tsp,egg yolk, beaten:1 ,vanilla:1 tsp,chocolate chips:1 cup,crunchy peanut butter:2-Jan cup
column5: Blend first 5 ingredients until it resembles corn meal.  Add egg and vanilla.  Mix well.  Press firmly into ungreased jelly roll pan.  Bake at 350 degrees for 25 minutes.  Cool slightly.  Melt chocolate over hot water.  Stir in peanut butter and cereal.  Spread on cookie dough.  Let stand until chocolate sets.  Cut into 35 bars.

column4: crushed walnuts:8 ounces,pitted dates:1 cup,flake coconut:2 1/2 cups,brown sugar:1 cup,eggs:2
column5: Preheat oven to 350 degrees.  Put walnuts and dates through coarse blade of grinder.  Combine with 1 1/2 cup coconut, sugar, and eggs.  Mix well.  Shape by spoonfuls into 3" logs, 3/4" wide.  Roll in rest of coconut, coating well.  Bake 10-12 minutes until golden.  Cool.  Makes 30 logs.

column4: butter:4-Mar cup,vanilla:1 tsp,water:1 tbsp,salt:8-Jan tsp,sugar:3-Jan cup,flour:2 cups,chocolate chips:6 oz.,finely chopped walnutspowdered sugar:1 cup
column5: Combine first 5 ingredients.  Blend well.  Stir in flour, chocolate chips, and nuts.  Form 1" balls.   Place on ungreased cookie sheet.  Bake 30 minutes at 350 degrees. Roll in powdered sugar while still warm. Makes approx. 5 dozen.

column4: butter or margarine:1 cup,sugar:1 1/2 cups,egg:1 ,flour:2 cups,soda:2 tsps,raisins (or finely diced prunes or dates):2 cups,rolled oats:1 1/4 cups
column5: Beat butter and sugar together until fluffy, beat in egg.  Stir flour with soda, then stir into creamed mixture with raisins and rolled oats.  Mix well.  Divide dough into 15 equal portions.  Place 3 or 4 portions each on ungreased 12" by 15" baking sheet.  Pinch dough to shape 8" ropes and place at least 2 inches apart.  Flatten each rope into a 2" wide strip.  Bake in a 30 degree oven until golden brown, about 10 minutes.  Let cool on pan about 2 minutes, then cut each strip diagonally into 1 inch wide bars.  Let cookies cool on pan then transfer from pan with a wide spatula.  Store in an airtight container at room temperature up to 2 weeks.  Makes about 12 dozen.

column4: sifted flour:1 1/2 cups,salt:2-Jan tsp,baking soda:1 tsp,shortening:2-Jan cups,granulated sugar:1 cup,eggs:2 ,vanilla:2-Jan tsp,brown sugar:1 cup,egg white, stiffly beaten:1
column5: Sift flour, salt and baking powder together.  Cream shortening with sugar until fluffy.  Add eggs, vanilla and sifted ingredients and mix well.  Spread batter very thin on baking sheets.  Fold brown sugar into egg whites, add nuts.  Spread over cookie batter.  Bake at 325 degrees for 30 minutes.  Cut into squares.  Makes 30.

column4: brown sugar:1 cup,egg:1 ,margarine:2 tbsp,molasses:4-Jan cup,vanilla:1 tsp,flour:1 cup,soda:2-Jan tsp,salt:2-Jan tsp,cinnamon:2-Jan tsp,cloves:4-Jan tsp,milk:2-Jan cup,chopped nuts:1 cup
column5: Mix first four ingredients.  Add dry ingredients with milk.  Mix well.  Add nuts.  Pour into greased 9" square pan.  Bake at 350 degrees for 35 to 40 minutes.  Cool in pan.  Cut into 24 bars, roll in powdered sugar.

column4: shortening:4-Mar cup,brown sugar:1 cup,egg:1 ,molasses:4-Jan cup,ginger:1 tsp,cinnamon:1 tsp,cloves:2-Jan tsp,soda:2 tsp,flour:2 cups
column5: Roll in little balls.  Dip in sugar and flatten with glass dipped in water.  Bake at 350 degrees about 7 minutes.

column4: flour2-Jan:2 cups,3-Jan:cup whole wheat flour,2-Jan:cup brown sugar,2-Jan:cup shortening,4-Jan:tsp cinnamon,4-Jan:cup honey,3:cup oil,1:tbsp cold water,1:tsp salt
column5: Stir all ingredients about 3 minutes to mix well.  Divide in half.  Place each half on 17"x14" baking sheet.  Flatten and roll to 12" x 10" rectangle, dusting with flour to prevent sticking.  Cut into 2" squares.  Prick with fork.Bake at 425 degrees for 8-10 minutes until lightly browned.  Cut apart while hot.  Cool on baking sheet.  Makes 60.  50 calories each.

column4: flour:1 cup,margarine:2-Jan cup,powdered sugar:4-Jan cup,:2 eggs,sugar:1 cup,baking powder:2-Jan tsp,salt:4-Jan tsp,lemon peel:2 Tbsp,Lemon juice:2 Tbsp
column5: Mix first 3 ingredients well.  Press into 8"x8"x2" pan.  Build up 1/2" edge.  Bake 20 minutes at 350 degrees.  Beat remaining 6 ingredients until light and fluffy.  Pour over hot crust.  Bake another 25 minutes.  Cool.  Dust with the powdered sugar.  Cut into squares.

column4: egg:1 ,oil:3-Feb cup,sugar:2-Jan cup,mint apple jelly:4-Mar cup,flour:1 1/2 cups,baking powder:1 1/2 tsp,salt:1 tsp
column5: Beat eggs until thick and foamy.  Gradually add sugar and continue to beat.  Soften mint jelly with a fork and add oil.  Mix well.  Add the flour, baking powder, and salt.  Spread mixture in a 9"x13" pan that is oiled.  Bake at 350 degrees for 25 minutes.  Frost with mint frosting:  Cream 1/4 cup margarine.  Add 1/2 cup mint jelly.  Blend.  Add 2 cups sifted powdered sugar.  Mix Well.  Cut into 32 bars.

column4: sugar:1 1/4 cups,brown sugar:1 cup,margarine:1 cup,eggs:2 ,peanut butter:1 cup,flour:3 cups,soda:1 tsp,salt:2-Jan tsp,vanilla:1 tsp
column5: Form into balls.  Flatten with fork dipped in flour or sugar. Bake for 8 minutes at 375 degrees.

column4: butter or margarine:4-Jan cup,light brown sugar, firmly packed:2-Jan cup,egg :1 ,sifted flour:2-Jan cup,graham cracker crumbs:2-Jan cup,crushed pineapple, drained.:1 8 1/2 oz. can,walnuts, chopped:2-Jan cup
column5: Preheat oven to 350 degrees.  Lightly grease 8"x8"x2" pan.  Mix butter with sugar until light.  Beat in egg.  Stir in flour, graham cracker crumbs, pineapple, and walnuts.  Bake 30-35 minutes or until browned and surface is firm to the touch.  Let cool completely in plan. Cut into 20 bars.

column4: pitted prunes:1 1/2 cups,margarine:2-Jan cup,sugar:4-Jan cup,sifted flour:1 1/3 cups,baking powder:2-Jan tsp,salt:4-Jan tsp,brown sugar:1 cup,eggs:2 ,lemon juice:2 tsp,walnuts, chopped:1 cup,coconutconfectioner's sugar:2-Jan cup
column5: Cook Prunes - drain and chop.  Mix margarine, sugar and 1 cup of four.  Press into 9" square pan.  Bake at 350 degrees for 25 minutes.   Sift remaining 1/3 cup flour with baking powder and salt.  Beat brown sugar into eggs, lemon and vanilla.  Add flour, mix well.  Add prunes, nuts, and coconut.  Spread over baked bars.  Bake at 350 degrees for 30-35 minutes.  Cool.  Cut into 24 bars.  Roll in confectioner's sugar.

column4: eggs:4 ,sugar:3 cups,oil:1 cup,oatmeal:3 cups,soda:2 tsp,salt:1 tsp,nuts:1 cup,raisins:1 cup,allspice:2-Jan tsp,pumpkin pie spice:1 tsp,cinnamon:1 tsp,cloves:1 tsp,nutmeg:1 tsp,pumpkin pie spice:1 small can,flour:4 cups
column5: Mix eggs, sugar, oil, spices, and pumpkin.  Add oats, soda, salt nuts, and raisins.  Mix well.  Add flour, 1/2 at a time.  Drop by teaspoons on ungreased cookie sheet.  (These will not spread.)  Bake 10 minutes at 325 degrees.  Remove from pan.  Store in tightly sealed container.

column4: flour:2 3/4 cups,cream of tartar:2 tsp,baking soda:1 tsp,salt:2-Jan tsp,margarine:4-Mar cups,sugar:1 1/2 cups,eggs:2 ,sugar:2 Tbps,cinnamon:1 tsp
column5: Mix first 7 ingredients.  Roll in balls.  Dip in mixture of cinnamon and sugar.  Bake for 8-10 minutes at 375 degrees.  Makes 4 dozen.

column4: butter or margarine:2-Jan cup,sugar:1 1/2 cups,eggs:2 ,vanilla:1 tsp,sifted flour:3 cups,salt:1 tsp,baking powder:2-Jan tsp,baking soda:2-Jan tsp,sour creamcinnamon and sugar:1 cups
column5: Cream butter.  Add sugar gradually while continuing to cream.  Ad eggs one at a time, beating well after each.  Add vanilla.  Beat until light and fluffy.  Add mixed dry ingredients, alternately with sour cream, begin and end with dry ingredients.  For 3 inch cookies drop by heaping teaspoons.  With spatula flatten into circles about 2 inch wide.  Sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon.  Bake in hot oven - 400 degrees for 10-20 minutes.  Makes about thirty - 3 inch cookies.

column4: Crisco (shortening):2-Jan cup,egg:1 ,sugar:2 cups,salt:2-Jan tsp,vanilla:1 tsp,flour:1 2/3 cups
column5: Mix first 5 ingredients.  Add flour.  Roll into ball.   Make a thumbprint in each ball.  Cook 8-10 minutes at 350 degrees.  Fill with jelly or chopped nuts.

column4: margarine:1 cup,sugar:1 cup,egg:1 ,flour:2 cups,nutmeg:3-Jan tsp,nuts, chopped:1 cups
column5: Cream butter and sugar.  Beat in egg yolk.  Sift four and spice, add to creamed mixture.  Spread dough in 15"x10"x1" jelly roll pan.  Press flat with hands.  Beat egg white slightly, brush on dough.  Sprinkle nuts on top and press into dough.  Bake in 250 degree oven for 1 hour.  While hot cut into 1 1/2" squares.  Cool.  Makes about 70.

column4: baked pastry shell:1 ,cornstarch:3 Tbsp,water:1 2/3 cups,sweetened condensed milk:1 14 oz can,egg yolks, beaten:3 , margarine or butter:2 Tbsp,vanilla:1 tsp,bananaslemon juice from concentratewhipped cream:3 medium
column5: In a heavy saucepan dissolve cornstarch inwater, stir in sweetened condensed milk and egg yolks.  Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly.  Remove from heat, add margarine and vanilla.  Cool slightly.  Slice 2 bananas, dip in lemon juice and drain.  Arrange on bottom of prepare crust.  Pour filling over bananas, cover.  Chill 4 hours or until set.  Spread top with whipped cream.  Slice remaining bananas, dip in lemon juice, drain and garnish top of pie.  Refrigerate leftovers.

column4: pie shell, unbaked:1 9 inch,tart apples, peeled and sliced:4 or 5 ,sugar:1 cup,flour:4-Jan cup,salt:2-Jan tsp,heavy creamcinnamon:1 cup
column5: Place apples in the pie shell.  Mix together sugar, flour, and salt.  Sprinkle over apples.  in a sauce pan bring cream to boiling point.  Pour over apples.  Sprinkle generously with cinnamon.  Bake at 375 degrees for 45 minutes, until firm.

column4: large apples, sliced:4 ,sugar:1 cup ,cinnamon:1 tsp,flour:4-Mar cup ,butter:3-Jan cup ,cinnamon:2-Jan tsp
column5: Combine apples, 1/2 cup sugar, and cinnamon.  Put into the unbaked pie shell.  Top with 1/2 cup sugar, flour, butter, and cinnamon.  Bake 45-50 minutes at 350 degrees.

column4: cornstarch:2 Tbsp,sugar:1 cup ,water:1 1/4 cups,red food coloring:a few drops,butter:1 Tbsp,lemon juice:1 tsp,strawberries:1 basket,pie shell, baked:1
column5: Slice 1 basket of strawberries.  Put half the berries in the bottom of a baked pie shell. Prepare glaze by combining remaining ingredients and cooking in a double-boiler until thickened.   Stir the other half of the berries into the glaze.  Pour into the shell.  Cool.  Top with whipped cream and halved berries."

column4: sugar:1 cup,cornstarch:2-Jan cup,water:1 cup,lemon rind, grated:1 tsp,lemon juice:3-Jan cup,eggs:2 ,cream cheesegraham cracker crust:4 ounces
column5: Combine in sauce pan 3/4 cup sugar, cornstarch, water, lemon rind, and juice, and slightly beaten egg yolk.  Cook over medium heat stirring constantly until thick.  Remove from heat.  Add softened cheese, blend well.  Cool.  Beat egg whites until stiff.  Add 1/4 sugar.  Fold into lemon mixture.  Spoon into crust.  Chill 2 hours.  Serve with whipped cream.

column4: sugar:1 cup,cornstarch:3 Tbsp,butter:4-Jan cup,lemon rind, grated:1 Tbsp,lemon juice:4-Jan cup,egg yolks, slightly beaten:3 ,milk:1 cup,sour cream:1 cup,pie shell:1 8"
column5: Combine sugar, cornstarch, butter, lemon rind, and egg yolk in saucepan.  Stir in milk.  Cook over medium heat, stirring until mixture thickens.  Cool.  Fold in sour cream.  Spoon into pie shell.  Col 12 hours or longer.  Top with whipped cream.  Garnish with chopped walnuts if desired.

column4: sugar:1 cup,cornstarch:4 Tbsp,salt:2-Jan tsp,hot water:2 cups,lemon juice, fresh or bottled:3-Jan cup,grated lemon juice:1 tsp,egg yolks:3 ,butter:1 Tbsp,egg whites:3
column5: Mix sugar, cornstarch, and salt in top of double boiler.  Place over boiling water and add remaining ingredients.  Cook until thick, stirring with whip.  Put into baked pie shell.  Top with meringue.  To make meringue whip 3 egg whites until stiff.  Add 1/4 cup sugar.  Brown 5 to 10 minutes in 400 degree oven.  Chill.
